A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I didn´t liked the Force Awakens (a reboot of \"A new Hope\" with the same plotholes and none of the originality!!) and was not holding great expectations for this movie\, but it managed to be considerably worse than what I expected it to be - as a matter of fact\, worse than all the prequels\, worse SW movie ever\, if we exclude of course SW Holiday Special... I´ve lost interest in watching the next movie\, which for a die-hard SW fan like myself is almost unthinkable... probably time to grow up\, I guess.\nThe only hope now are the spin-off movies... \"Rogue One\" was great\, best SW movie after the original trilogy... let´s hope the movie about Han Solo will be all right.
